name: Fertility Rate - WC-IIASA (2017)
title: Fertility Rate - WC-IIASA (2017)
description: In the original data the fertility rate refer to 5 year windows. Here the mid year for each window is taken. For example 1978 here refers to the period 1975-1980.

sources.name: WC-IIASA (Fertility Rate by education scenario) (2017)
sources.dataPublisherSource: These projections were produced by a large team of researchers at the Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human Capital and at related institutions.
sources.additionalInfo: In the original data the fertility rate refer to 5 year windows. Here the mid year for each window is taken. For example 1978 here refers to the period 1975-1980.
